verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus Christ have mercy,
Jesus Christ have mercy,
Jesus Christ have mercy,
Jesus Christ have mercy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy,
O Lord have mercy.
